author: longka
title: Haskell for beginners in Vietnamese
description: Haskell is freaking hard to learn! And even harder for beginner in Vietnam to feel it.

f6_assessments.q0:
Finding a Blockchain programmer in Vietnam is difficult, but finding a programmer who knows how to use the Haskell programming language is much more difficult.
Cardano Blockchain development projects in Vietnam is increasing, so the need to find programmers who know Haskel will increase, but if forced to hire programmers abroad, it will be a disadvantage for those Vietnamese projects because the cost of labor abroad is many times higher than that of Vietnam.
Therefore, the project of creating courses for Haskell programmers in Vietnam is extremely necessary.
Programmers are the most important initial elements of a technology project, so if this proposal is funded, it will be very good for the Cardano community in Vietnam.
f6_assessments.q1:
With experience in programming Haskell and operating Stake Pool ADA, I believe that you can completely impart the most basic knowledge to beginners.

Regarding the content of the curriculum, I recommend that you write in more detail about what users will be learned, what they need to prepare to best absorb this content, and how to assess thier understanding and practice what they have learned.

As for the budget, I have not seen the details to explain the part of your budget that is $12000.

As for the detailed plan, there should be timelines and expected results for the voters to have a piece of basic knowledge to evaluate your project.
f6_assessments.q2:
The number of views on Youtube is just one of the indicators that can evaluate the quality of a course. If possible, you can design a website with reviews so that participants can see how much their knowledge is learned from the course.

The success of the course could be the number of people who understand what the Haskell programming language is and can get related work. To know this indicator, you can create a simple questionnaire to survey people who have visited and watched your course videos.

f6_assessments.q0: The purpose of this proposal is to accomplish its objective, which is to produce an introductory Haskell lesson. Cardano's decentralized app development is extremely reliant on developers, who are also an essential component of the success of modern Blockchain platforms. It's feasible that taking this Haskell course will make it possible for programmers to learn Haskell, which would make it easier for them to build applications that use Cardano. The concept that has been proposed to create training videos in Vietnamese is a fantastic one. This is due to the fact that local developers in Vietnam do not have access to any book or paper pertaining to Haskell. In addition, the team has already completed the haskell fundamental playlist in Vietnamese, which leads me to assume that they are able to complete the other videos. This proposal successfully addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The group has planned out  out the topics that will be produced, but they have not established a specific deadline. The team needs to decide how long it will take to make a video and when it will be released. The team has demonstrated their proficiency in Haskell through the production of multiple videos; however, I would be interested in learning more about the individual members' backgrounds through the use of personal profiles. In terms of the budget, I believe that the sum of $12 000 is quite costly compared to the remaining tasks besides the topic that have already been produced. In addition, the tasks for which the funding will be spent are not described in any great depth.
In general, the group has to present a greater quantity of facts in order to strengthen the project's credibility.
f6_assessments.q2:
This proposal incorporates general metrics that can be used to monitor the progress of the project. Nevertheless, I believe that the team should determine an objective that the team wants to accomplish as a result of this. Take, for instance:
- 100 views per video
- A minimum of fifty interactions for each video
The community should be able to keep tabs on the development of each work and critique it, thus the team should update the community on the progress of each work once a week or once a month, document it, and make it public.

f6_assessments.q0: The goal of the proposal is to give Vietnamese developers and the Cardano community a means to more quickly and easily learn Haskell by identifying the corresponding issue in the challenge and offering a solution in the Vietnamese language. The release, however, does not explicitly describe how it will contribute value to the Cardano ecosystem or detail the dangers and difficulties of putting the project into practice or how to deal with upcoming difficulties. The worldwide project is constrained since the initiative's target audience must be specialized.
f6_assessments.q1: The topic provides the linguistic aspects to implement the project. The proposed work needs to be done. However, do not build a timeline to complete the work that only shows what is being done, but somehow and by whom, the plan describes all the resources needed to implement the proposal. The budget is clearly outlined and broken down to identify items; plans to achieve item titles; has not provided information about calculating its salary; The proposer did not provide certifications (document references, affiliations, etc.) of technical relevance and experience required to implement the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: "The proposal lays out detailed objectives. However, a roadmap with important milestones and clear timelines for achievement has not been provided. There are no well thought out indicators/KPIs that determine the success of the proposal. The solution is not clear and effective enough to solve the problem. There is not yet an accessible public channel to provide information. Regular updates to the community to check project progress.

f6_assessments.q0: Because most Vietnamese people do not use English fluently, having a Vietnamese document on Haskell programming will make it easier for Vietnamese programmers to access. Haskell is also a new language, so when it is easier to access it, it will help programmers not be afraid, since then, more and more programmers will know, love and use haskell. More programmers know haskell, which means that more developers in Vietnam will have the opportunity to access and develop applications in many areas of Cardano's ecosystem such as plutus, dapp applications, smartcontract... expand the ecosystem of cardano, true to the purpose of Fund 9 campaign is Grow East Asia, Grow Cardano.
